overview:
joplin: 11 tools; joplin_create_note -> 
    Create note with Markdown body, optional tags, to-do support.

    Specify notebook_id to ta..., joplin_create_notebook -> Create notebook or return existing., joplin_delete_note -> ⚠️ Delete note permanently., joplin_ensure_running -> Ensure API ready., joplin_get_note -> Get note by ID with full Markdown content., joplin_list_notebooks -> List notebooks with IDs and hierarchy., joplin_list_notes -> List notes with IDs, titles, dates., joplin_list_tags -> List all tags with IDs., joplin_search_notes -> Search notes., joplin_tag_note -> Add tag to note., joplin_update_note -> Update note title, body, or move to different notebook.
